thread.section_title: Arizona Bead Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Arizona Bead Company | arizonabeadcompany.com
thread.title: Billy
thread.title_full: Arizona Bead Company reviewed by Billy

author: Billy
title: Billy
text: I would recommend Arizona Bead Company to anyone interested in ordering beads or magnetic beads. I will be ordering from them again because the service is fast and what they advertise is accurate to what they say it is. These magnetic beads I ordered, are the strongest I've seen so far. You can't go wrong with Arizona Bead Company!!
